From: "Anthony J. Bryant" <ajbryant@...>

brobpatus@... wrote:

> I am a retired history professor with a special interest in Medieval
> Japanese History.....I have a copy of Papinot, but I was wondering if
> there are other sources which give detailed genealogies of the
> various Daimyo and Samurai families as well as the Imperial Family?

Be warned that Papinot is rife with errors large and small, and is a
product of its time. Unfortunately, there is nothing else in English that
is both so concise and so detailed.

If you speak Japanese, there are many excellent sources I can point you to,
but if not, it's a bit more difficult. Any particular area or period you're
most interested in?

Tony
